name: The Red Virus
description:
The Red Virus is an easy and simple game. You need to avoid people with the red virus as long as you can while collecting points! Can you able to survive this craziness? Download and play the Game now!

HOW TO CONTROL?

It's easy! Like other games, you just need to press W to go up, S to go down, D to go right, and A to go left! If you didn't enjoy using those, Try use the arrow keys on your keyboard to control the Player.

What should I do after download the file?

The File you had download was a zip format. After you downloaded it, You need to extract all the file in the folder! You will be able to open the Application after you extracted it.

Notes from the Developer

This game was designed one day before released. There will be more updates in this Game in the future.

ENJOY THE GAME!
